content: made this little top hat for a tiny snowman i made and figured i had to make a mad hatters version for the pattern figured it could probably come in use for your amigurumi not to mention would be great to add on a mini snowman materials the yarn worsted weight - color a main color - color b ribbon color size g6/4 00mm hook small amount of stuffing scissors needle gauge 5 rnds and 4 sts per 1 | finished piece is about 2 tall worked in the round the stitches - chain chain stitch - st stitch - slip_stitch slip_stitch - single_crochet single_crochet - increase increase - flo front loops only - blo back loops only
